(Yes, Code, my fault.  Now that you mention that, it's unfair.  I could keep 
up the shields with "extra power" mumbo jumbo and your guys could be turned 
into pancakes.  So never mind, autoguns are destroyalbe, all of them, though 
I'm not sure about people inside the hatchways of the Pred ship, you'd have 
to ask Hell Beast or Yanshosh)

Double Punch/Injector/Manterror/Bumblebee:

Double Punch cursed.  "48% of the autoguns down?  Hmmm...," he said, looking 
at a screen as he saw the shields slip to 75%, "those two are attacking the 
Maximals." referring to Sinister and Sinesis.  

-----

Injector fired two more stinger missiles off at the attacking People's Group 
members, randomly.

-----

"Die!" Manterror yelled, firing off four ion disks (two from each hand) 
randomly at the attacing People's Group.

-----

Bumblebee chuckled, raising both of his stinger missile launchers, firing off 
two stinger missiles at Plintissa, two from the other launcher at Dracona, 
and two optic blasts at a random member of the attackers of the Pred base.
